Content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Author: Confucius

Content: Study the past, if you would divine the future.
Author: Confucius

Content: If we don't know life, how can we know death?
Author: Confucius

Content: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.
Author: Confucius

Content: I hear, I know. I see, I remember. I do, I understand.
Author: Confucius

Content: If we don't know life, how can we know death?
Author: Confucius
